scripts.codegen: yarn run codegen:schema && yarn run codegen:graph
scripts.deploy:ropsten: yarn graph deploy mStable/mStable-ecosystem-ropsten --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy:kovan: yarn graph deploy mStable/mStable-ecosystem-kovan --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn graph deploy mStable/mStable-ecosystem-staging --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn graph deploy mStable/mStable-ecosystem --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
